title: JavaScript for Beginners
body: Learn the basics of JavaScript, including variables, functions, loops, and DOM manipulation.

title: Mastering Python
body: Dive deep into Python programming with a focus on data structures, OOP, and real-world projects.

title: React Fundamentals
body: Build dynamic web applications with React, JSX, components, and hooks.

title: Introduction to C++
body: Understand the core concepts of C++ programming including syntax, memory management, and STL.

title: Node.js and Express
body: Learn backend development using Node.js and Express framework with REST APIs and MongoDB integration.
